spec.description: Metal3DataTemplateSpec defines the desired state of Metal3DataTemplate.

clusterName.description: ClusterName is the name of the Cluster this object belongs to.

metaData.description: MetaData contains the information needed to generate the metadata secret

dnsServersFromIPPool.description: DNSServersFromPool is the list of metadata items to be rendered as dns servers.

apiGroup.description: APIGroup is the api group of the IP pool.

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

kind.description: Kind is the kind of the IP pool

name.description: Name is the name of the IP pool used to fetch the value to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

fromAnnotations.description:
FromAnnotations is the list of metadata items to be fetched from object
Annotations

annotation.description: Annotation is the key of the Annotation to fetch

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

object.description: Object is the type of the object from which we retrieve the name

fromHostInterfaces.description:
FromHostInterfaces is the list of metadata items to be rendered as MAC
addresses of the host interfaces.

interface.description:
Interface is the name of the interface in the BareMetalHost Status Hardware
Details list of interfaces from which to fetch the MAC address.

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

fromLabels.description: FromLabels is the list of metadata items to be fetched from object labels

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

label.description: Label is the key of the label to fetch

object.description: Object is the type of the object from which we retrieve the name

gatewaysFromIPPool.description: GatewaysFromPool is the list of metadata items to be rendered as gateway addresses.

apiGroup.description: APIGroup is the api group of the IP pool.

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

kind.description: Kind is the kind of the IP pool

name.description: Name is the name of the IP pool used to fetch the value to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

indexes.description:
Indexes is the list of metadata items to be rendered from the index of the
Metal3Data

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

offset.description: Offset is the offset to apply to the index when rendering it

step.description: Step is the multiplier of the index

ipAddressesFromIPPool.description: IPAddressesFromPool is the list of metadata items to be rendered as ip addresses.

apiGroup.description: APIGroup is the api group of the IP pool.

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

kind.description: Kind is the kind of the IP pool

name.description: Name is the name of the IP pool used to fetch the value to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

namespaces.description: Namespaces is the list of metadata items to be rendered from the namespace

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

objectNames.description:
ObjectNames is the list of metadata items to be rendered from the name
of objects.

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

object.description: Object is the type of the object from which we retrieve the name

prefixesFromIPPool.description: PrefixesFromPool is the list of metadata items to be rendered as network prefixes.

apiGroup.description: APIGroup is the api group of the IP pool.

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

kind.description: Kind is the kind of the IP pool

name.description: Name is the name of the IP pool used to fetch the value to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

strings.description: Strings is the list of metadata items to be rendered from strings

key.description: Key will be used as the key to set in the metadata map for cloud-init

value.description: Value is the string to render.

networkData.description:
NetworkData contains the information needed to generate the networkdata
secret

links.description: Links is a structure containing lists of different types objects

bonds.description: Bonds contains a list of Bond links

bondLinks.description: BondLinks is the list of links that are part of the bond.

bondMode.description:
BondMode is the mode of bond used. It can be one of
balance-rr, active-backup, balance-xor, broadcast, balance-tlb, balance-alb, 802.3ad

bondXmitHashPolicy.description: Selects the transmit hash policy used for port selection in balance-xor and 802.3ad modes

id.description: Id is the ID of the interface (used for naming)

macAddress.description:
MACAddress is the MAC address of the interface, containing the object
used to render it.

fromAnnotation.description:
FromAnnotation references an object Annotation to retrieve the
MAC address from

annotation.description: Annotation is the key of the Annotation to fetch

object.description: Object is the type of the object from which we retrieve the name

fromHostInterface.description:
FromHostInterface contains the name of the interface in the BareMetalHost
Introspection details from which to fetch the MAC address

string.description: String contains the MAC address given as a string

mtu.description: MTU is the MTU of the interface

parameters.description: params blob passed without any validation/modifications into cloud-init config

ethernets.description: Ethernets contains a list of Ethernet links

Type is the type of the ethernet link. It can be one of:
bridge, dvs, hw_veb, hyperv, ovs, tap, vhostuser, vif, phy

vlans.description: Vlans contains a list of Vlan links

networks.description: Networks  is a structure containing lists of different types objects

ipv4.description: IPv4 contains a list of IPv4 static allocations

fromPoolRef.description: FromPoolRef is a reference to a IP pool to allocate an address from.

apiGroup.description:
APIGroup is the group for the resource being referenced.
If APIGroup is not specified, the specified Kind must be in the core API group.
For any other third-party types, APIGroup is required.

kind.description: Kind is the type of resource being referenced

name.description: Name is the name of resource being referenced

ipAddressFromIPPool.description: IPAddressFromIPPool contains the name of the IP pool to use to get an ip address

link.description: Link is the link on which the network applies

routes.description: Routes contains a list of IPv4 routes

gateway.description: Gateway is the IPv4 address of the gateway

fromIPPool.description: FromIPPool is the name of the IPPool to fetch the gateway from

string.description: String is the gateway given as a string

network.description: Network is the IPv4 network address

prefix.description: Prefix is the mask of the network as integer (max 32)

services.description: Services is a list of IPv4 services

dns.description: DNS is a list of IPv4 DNS services

dnsFromIPPool.description: DNSFromIPPool is the name of the IPPool from which to get the DNS servers

templateReference.description:
TemplateReference refers to the Template the Metal3MachineTemplate refers to.
It can be matched against the key or it may also point to the name of the template
Metal3Data refers to.
Deprecated: This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.

status.description: Metal3DataTemplateStatus defines the observed state of Metal3DataTemplate.

indexes.description: Indexes contains the map of Metal3Machine and index used

lastUpdated.description: LastUpdated identifies when this status was last observed.

exampleYAML:
apiVersion: infrastructure.cluster.x-k8s.io/v1beta1
kind: Metal3DataTemplate
metadata:
  name: example-metal3datatemplate
  namespace: default
spec:
  clusterName: "example-clusterName"
